title: EASY video converter
description: With Easy Video Convert you can convert almost all video formats (e.g. AVI, DVD, QuickTime MOV/QT, Real Media RMVB/RM/RAM, MPEG4, WMV, MP4, M4V, 3GP, 3G2, MKV, WMV, H.264, H.263, AVC, VOB, MPEG1/2/4, DAT, ASF, ASX, DV, MPA, MPG, MQV, MJPEG, VCD) to iPod, iPhone, AppleTV, PSP, MPEG-4, H.264, H.263, AVC formats with just a few clicks. Time Range mode--you can convert only the selected time-range. Powerful Batch-Job Engine--each file/title/chapter can have its own settings, independent of the others. You can even customize the video quality, bitrate, framerate, resolution, cropping, and iPod options (Title, or Artist). It is a powerful movie/video converter with fast conversion speed, you can enjoy your favorite movies on your iPod, iPhone, AppleTV, PSP, Mobile Phone/Device, and any MPEG-4 Players. You'll be impressed by the simplicity of this software, and by the speed with which you can create them.
